sendKey.subject: Your new DAO-Account
sendKey.text:
Dear User

You just created a new Account in order to take part on the DAO.
Your public address is 0x$address$

You may put this key into ~/.ethereum/keystore -folder in order to use it

Your DAO-Team

confirmTx.subject: DAO-Transaction confirmed
confirmTx.text:
Dear DAO User

Your Transaction of $amount$ Ether has been confirmed. You can now use your Tokens assigned to the $adr$ to vote.

The DAO Team
